name: ITALIAN IRREGULAR VERBS CONJUGATION + PREPOSITIONS
description: -------------------------------------- COMING REAL SOON NOW... -------------------------------------- A new snappier version is in the Q2/20 pipeline. In the meantime, please download the current PRO version at a limited SPECIAL price while still available!  Got a DATE and need a ROSE? Do you know that you can indeed search for these valid _conjugated_ Italian verbs besides the root / infinitive forms and more (but with vastly different meanings)?  ITALIAN IRREGULAR VERBS CONJUGATION + PREPOSITIONS  The only off-line App with the most comprehensive collection of irregular Italian verbs and dictionary database. Text-to-Speech (TTS) voice pronunciation, prepositions, advanced search filters and more pack in an easy-to-use, user configurable, colour-coded, clean and uncluttered interface. Flexible and quick search function at your fingertips from infinitive root to various conjugated verb tenses and forms with search history log.  Optimised for mobile hand-held devices (works with tablets too)!
